boardgame.name: Qwirkle Cubes
boardgame.description: Qwirkle Cubes is a sequel of sorts to Qwirkle with the goal of the game being the same as before: Create rows and columns in which the tokens all match either in color or symbol in order to score points. Each time you add tokens to the playing area, you score points equal to the rows/columns that you create or add to. Close out a row by playing the sixth token in it, and you score six bonus points in addition to whatever else you score for the turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Qwirkle, the pieces have a colored symbol on one face and are otherwise blank, but in Qwirkle Cubes the tokens have six faces in the same color, with each face having a different one of the six symbols. On a turn, you:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Roll as many cubes from your hand as you want._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play cubes from your hand to build color lines and symbol lines._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Draw and roll replacement cubes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All the cubes are visible, so players can better judge their opponents' future moves _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; notwithstanding their rolls, mind you. The game continues until no more cubes remain in the reserve pool and one player has placed all of her cubes. This player scores a six point bonus, then the player with the most points wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2010 Golden Geek Best Abstract Board Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in their factory shrink-wrap. QWIRKLE CUBES: $21.95 Mindware [MDW 42034W] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $13.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD
for provfrog THANK YOU!! also includes: Royal Palace Shipping will be $13

MindWare (MWR42034) Qwirkle Cubes is the exciting sequel to MindWare_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s most awarded game ever. Qwirkle Cubes plays much like Qwirkle - simply create rows and columns of matching colors and shapes to score the most points. However, you have more control over your hand in Qwirkle Cubes because you can roll and re-roll your cubes to get the shapes you want!
Original packaging not included but cubes are in the supplied Qwirkle bag.
Reserved for auction winner MARJHAN Game is not in shrink, but all the cubes inside are still in shrink. Excellent condition.
